content: this small crochet guitar is the perfect gift for the musician in your life it makes for an adorable guitar keychain or as an accessory for small dolls like our kozu palm pals mini dolls 1 this guitar is approximately 4 5 inches long and takes about an hour to crochet this listing is for the ads-free print-friendly pdf pattern you can find the free pattern at https //chaicoffeecrochet com/crochet-guitar/ 1 https //chaicoffeecrochet com/kozu-palm-pals-crochet-dolls/
